headline.main: Agar Charges Neutrality Act Is Childish; Tells University Women It Helps Hitler

lead_paragraph: Describing the Neutrality Act as a product of "the same childish mentality as the Prohibition law," Dr. William Agar of Columbia University predicted yesterday the repeal of the act and the eventual entry of this country into the World War.
abstract: Predicts neutrality act repeal, s to Univ Women Assn
snippet: Describing the Neutrality Act as a product of "the same childish mentality as the Prohibition law," Dr. William Agar of Columbia University predicted yesterday the repeal of the act and the eventual entry of this country into the World War....
